rules_text:
Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.
Impetuous {1}{R} [i](If this card is put into exile from anywhere other than the stack, you may cast it for its impetuous cost. Then exile it.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]Delia thought she had made a friend. The newt just wanted its scales back.[/i]
